name: Last Chance Magic
description:
Last chance dice at the magic circle!

Push 'space' to start.

Press 'R' to roll the dice., then drag one to the field and the other to the spell-cup at the top of the screen.

Keep alive for as long as possible!

The spells are:

1) Fire. Damages creeps as they pass through it.

2) Poison. Damages creeps over time.

3) Freeze. Stops creeps in their tracks

4) Zap!. High quick damage

5) Wind. Blows creeps back where they came from

6) Bomb. V.high damage, but a long delay.

This was a difficult jam, but I'm immensly proud of the freshly-christed Heatwave Blitz Studio - the mighty Sam McConnell (programming) and

Erwan Stievenard (art) powered through unprecedented heat and also pressure to put together something that we're very proud of - a lot of interlocking systems, all designed and delivered within 48 hours.
